name: Be a Bean (Coder1196)
description:
Seven total levels.

Warning - Dont use fullscreen, this website is poor and wont handle the FPS drop!

Controls (They are also showed in game)
Movement - W, A, S, D

Top view - C
First person view - X
Third Person View - Z
Camera rotation and height - Arrow Keys
Reset rotation - R
Mouse click on pick up able objects to pick up them
Drop object in hand - P
